subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Will Power won the pole for the Indy Racing League’s Toyota Grand Prix of Long Beach. Power was replaced in one Team Penske car when Hélio Castroneves returned after being acquitted of five of six tax-evasion charges. But he jumped into another and outdueled the former IndyCar Series champion Dario Franchitti. The rookie Raphael Matos was third. Castroneves, who had not driven a racecar since October, qualified eighth for Sunday’s 23-car field.
